vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.26.6; his mother was Zeruiah (H6870);
brother of: Abishai (H0052) and Asahel (H6214)
§ Joab = "Jehovah is father"
1) son of David's sister Zeruiah and general of David's army
2) a Judaite descendant of Kenaz
3) a post exilic family
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Seruiá, hermana de David; jefe del ejército de David; (b)   hijo de Seraías; fundador de Ge-harasim (valle de Harasim); tribu de Judá; (c)   jefe de familia; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
約押 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華是父"
1) 大衛王的姐姐洗魯雅的兒子, 他是大衛軍隊的統帥
2) 猶大人基納斯的兒子 (代上 4:13-14)
3) 被擄後期的一個家族 (拉 8:9)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
约押 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华是父"
1) 大卫王的姐姐洗鲁雅的儿子, 他是大卫军队的统帅
2) 犹大人基纳斯的儿子 (代上 4:13-14)
3) 被掳后期的一个家族 (拉 8:9)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.14;
son of: Seraiah (H8304J)
§ Joab = "Jehovah is father"
1) son of David's sister Zeruiah and general of David's army
2) a Judaite descendant of Kenaz
3) a post exilic family

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.6;
son of: Pahath-moab (H6355);
brother of: Jeshua (H3442I)
§ Joab = "Jehovah is father"
1) son of David's sister Zeruiah and general of David's army
2) a Judaite descendant of Kenaz
3) a post exilic family

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.8.9
§ Joab = "Jehovah is father"
1) son of David's sister Zeruiah and general of David's army
2) a Judaite descendant of Kenaz
3) a post exilic family
